pages.text: Support can be found in two places:$(li)$(l:https://discord.com/invite/jXrx4Tu)CM's World discord$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://github.com/ClaudiusMinimus/99-Mods-on-the-Wall-Fabric-Edition/issues)Github$(/l)$()$(br2)Due to the early stages of pre-Release 1.18 and the limited number of mods, I am not able to include custom images, but will link them to imgur if needed.
If you feel a topic needs to be added to this book, please post it on discord.
